columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: MachineName
columns.description: The name of the machine where the vulnerability was detected.

columns.name: HostId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the host.

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP address of the vulnerable machine.

columns.name: OSFamily
columns.description: Operating system family.

columns.name: Application
columns.description: Name of the vulnerable application.

columns.name: AppFilePath
columns.description: File path of the vulnerable application.

columns.name: VulnId
columns.description: CVE identifier for the vulnerability.

columns.name: VulnTitle
columns.description: Title/description of the vulnerability.

columns.name: Severity
columns.description: Severity level (Critical, High, Medium, Low).

columns.name: CVSS
columns.description: CVSS score of the vulnerability.

columns.name: ExploitAvailable
columns.description: Indicates if an exploit is publicly available.

columns.name: ExploitedInWild
columns.description: Indicates if the vulnerability is being exploited in the wild.

columns.name: PatchAvailable
columns.description: Indicates if a patch is available.

columns.name: FirstSeen
columns.description: Timestamp when the vulnerability was first detected.

columns.name: LastSeen
columns.description: Timestamp when the vulnerability was last detected.

columns.name: LastScanTime
columns.description: Timestamp of the last vulnerability scan.

columns.name: AssetCriticality
columns.description: Criticality rating of the asset.

columns.name: BusinessOwner
columns.description: Business owner responsible for the asset.

columns.name: Source
columns.description: Source of the vulnerability data.
